20.eng-name: The Book of Qiyam Al-Lail (The Night Prayer) and Voluntary Prayers During the Day

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:"My closest friend advised me to do three things: 'To pray witr at the beginning of the night, to pray two rak'ahs of Fajr and to fast three days of each month

chapter.ara-name: باب الْحَثِّ عَلَى الْوِتْرِ قَبْلَ النَّوْمِ
chapter.eng-name: Encouragement to pray witr before sleeping
